title: Outrage as ‘millions could lose free TV’ - ‘cruel and thoughtless’
desc: EXCLUSIVE: The move would be 'completely unacceptable' and could leave pensioners isolated, according to experts.

title: Regulators OK ESPN's deal for NFL Network, RedZone rights from NFL
desc: ESPN's purchase of NFL Network and other league digital assets has been finalized after government regulators approved the transaction.

title: “They left it all out there”: IU basketball displays character, grit in double overtime win at UCLA
desc: LOS ANGELES – UCLA’s prayer was answered. The Bruins, who trailed by 10 with less than two minutes left, tied the game on a Trent Perry 3-pointer with mere seconds on the clock to force overtime.

title: Back On Track
desc: Behind a three-point night from Amadeus Lombardi (1-2—3), the Griffins jumped back in the win column and defeated the Chicago Wolves 5-2.

title: More to be called up over alleged zakat-funded land purchase
desc: Penang MACC says they will be summoned to assist in a probe into the alleged abuse of power involving a senior state government official.

title: Nairobi Rescues 18 from Russian Frontlines as 200 More Trapped
desc: Mudavadi reveals plans to rescue Kenyans caught up in Russia-Ukraine war as videos reveal recruitment secrets.

title: Jelly Roll Stuns Fans with 275-Lb Weight Loss at Pre-Grammy Gala Appearance
desc: 'Wow he looks soooooooo different,' one fan noticed.

title: Iran hints at progress toward negotiations with US
desc: US President Donald Trump also said there was contact between Washington and Tehran. It comes as the US has deployed several warships off the Iranian coast.

title: PM Takaichi clarifies remarks risked being seen as backing weaker yen
desc: Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi on Sunday sought to clarify remarks she made the previous day that risked being interpreted as an endorsement of a weaker yen, apparently wary of possible volatile currency moves before markets reopen.

title: Israel lacks military attaché in Washington amid US security crisis, IDF and Defense
desc: Analysis: At this most sensitive time requiring close military coordination between Israel, US, the IDF has not had a military attaché in Washington for two months, following dispute between Katz and Zamir; And this conflict is causing real damage to Israel's security
